channel.title: docker networking on Devflection
channel.description: Recent content in docker networking on Devflection

item.title: Connect two docker containers in different docker-compose files
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heričko)
item.description: This post is inspired by an issue I encountered while trying to connect two docker containers located in two different docker-compose files. It briefly describes how this situation can happen and how to handle it.
